import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get inventory catalog item by ID (POST)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/items/{InventoryItemId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single inventory catalog item by its unique identifier using POST method.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). The POST variant allows passing additional request options in the body for field projections.

**Advantages over GET**:
- Control which related objects are expanded via `Fields` parameter
- Request `Category`, custom field values, or stock summaries

**Related Endpoints**:
- Simple retrieval: [GET /api/v1.0/inventory/items/\{InventoryItemId\}](/docs/api/inventory/get-inventory-item-by-id)
- Query multiple: [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/items/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-items)
- Update: [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/items/\{InventoryItemId\}/update](/docs/api/inventory/update-inventory-item)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"InventoryItemId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the inventory catalog item.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
